revision.text:
==Description== [http://www.playerconnector.com/nuke/images/blocks/pcbig.jpg http://www.playerconnector.com/nuke/images/blocks/pcthumb.png]
A new Lobby-based online service for multiplayer matchmaking built upon the Doom Connector 3 source. Although it looks similar to [[Doom Connector]], there are many major differences.
* Unlike DC3, there is no longer simply one developer, but rather, a team of people ([http://playerconnector.com/?p=staff Player Connector Staff]) ==Supported Games== * Call Of Duty * Call Of Duty 2 * CSDoom * Doom 3 * Doom 3: Resurrection of Evil * Doom Legacy * GZDoom * Halo: Combat Evolved * JDoom * Medal Of Honor: Allied Assualt * Moves * QuakeWorld * Quake 2 * Quake 3 * Quake 3 Demo * Quake 4 * Quake 4 Demo * Return To Castle Wolfenstein * Return To Castle Wolfenstein Demo * SkullTag * Soldier Of Fortune 2 * Soldier Of Fortune 2 Demo * Sonic Robo Blast * Tribes * Vavoom * Wolfenstein: Enemy Territory * ZDaemon * ZDoom * ZDoomGL
==Features==
* There are weekly tournaments and events that give you points for your score.
* Each player has their own score, and a set icon according to their score.
* New services such as a Wadbot (Wad hosting/retrieval service) and the Quotebot.
* Many other new features
== External Links ==
* [http://www.playerconnector.com/ Player Connector website] [[Category:Dead software]]
